Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the Registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#32;&#32;&#32;&#32;&#32;&#32;&#32;&#32; &#9744; &#160; Item 5.07&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Submission of Matters to a Vote of Security Holders. The Annual Meeting of Shareholders of Apple Inc. was held on &#32; March&#160;1, 2019 . At the Annual Meeting, Apple&#8217;s shareholders voted on the following five proposals and cast their votes as described below. 1. The individuals listed below were elected at the Annual Meeting to serve as directors of Apple until the next annual meeting of shareholders and until their successors are duly elected and qualified: &#160; &#160; For &#160; Against &#160; Abstained &#160; Broker Non-Vote James Bell &#160; 2,664,386,155 &#160; 40,229,756 &#160; 5,182,628 &#160; 1,402,346,727 Tim Cook &#160; 2,681,116,075 &#160; 25,363,575 &#160; 3,318,889 &#160; 1,402,346,727 Al Gore &#160; 2,599,605,229 &#160; 105,339,035 &#160; 4,854,275 &#160; 1,402,346,727 Bob Iger &#160; 2,672,558,422 &#160; 32,104,855 &#160; 5,135,262 &#160; 1,402,346,727 Andrea Jung &#160; 2,588,984,846 &#160; 116,206,940 &#160; 4,606,753 &#160; 1,402,346,727 Art Levinson &#160; 2,627,736,255 &#160; 77,095,012 &#160; 4,967,272 &#160; 1,402,346,727 Ron Sugar &#160; 2,668,301,042 &#160; 34,730,214 &#160; 6,767,283 &#160; 1,402,346,727 Sue Wagner &#160; 2,687,101,222 &#160; 17,876,807 &#160; 4,820,510 &#160; 1,402,346,727 2. A management proposal to ratify the appointment of Ernst &amp; Young LLP as Apple&#8217;s independent registered public accounting firm for 2019 was approved. For &#160; Against &#160; Abstained 4,034,437,468 &#160; 64,880,273 &#160; 12,827,525 3. An advisory resolution to approve executive compensation was approved. For &#160; Against &#160; Abstained &#160; Broker Non-Vote 2,529,567,261 &#160; 168,817,766 &#160; 11,413,512 &#160; 1,402,346,727 4. A shareholder proposal entitled &#8220;Shareholder Proxy Access Amendments&#8221; was not approved. For &#160; Against &#160; Abstained &#160; Broker Non-Vote 794,466,640 &#160; 1,896,421,668 &#160; 18,910,231 &#160; 1,402,346,727 5. A shareholder proposal entitled &#8220;True Diversity Board Policy&#8221; was not approved. For &#160; Against &#160; Abstained &#160; Broker Non-Vote 45,732,679 &#160; 2,627,300,224 &#160; 36,765,636 &#160; 1,402,346,727 SIGNATURE Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized.
